description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 231215FUL dated 02/06/2023 for: Change of use of Mini Cab Offices (Use Class Sui Generis) to a Caf√©/Showroom (commercial unit) (Use Class E(a)(b)); alterations to front shopfront involving installation of new shop front, replacement of front door with double glazed door, installation of new tiles to front entrance; single storey side/rear extension (following demolition of existing side/ rear addition); single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear addition); installation of rear garden patio, new glazing; installation of cycle storage; bin storage to rear. Amendment seeks to allow to add an awning and shutters to the proposed front elevation
